meanings.definition: The state of lacking worth or importance.
meanings.sent1: The valuelessness of the old toy made it hard to sell.
meanings.sent2: The valuelessness of the broken vase was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The valuelessness of the fake diamond caused quite a stir at the party.
meanings.sent4: The valuelessness of his promises became clear as time went on.
meanings.sent5: The valuelessness of the rusty key was a constant reminder of the lost treasure.

meanings.definition: The quality of having no value or significance.
meanings.sent1: She felt the valuelessness of her efforts after the project failed.
meanings.sent2: The valuelessness of the counterfeit currency was quickly discovered.
meanings.sent3: The valuelessness of the expired coupon left her disappointed at the store.
meanings.sent4: The valuelessness of his words echoed in her mind long after he left.
meanings.sent5: The valuelessness of the empty box was a stark reminder of the stolen contents.
